query.statement:
SELECT MAX(PSPID) AS PSPID ,MAX(ZSITE_NM) AS ZSITE_NM
,CHAR(COUNT(POSID)) AS POSID
,SUBSTR(MAX(DATE4),5,2)||'월'||SUBSTR(MAX(DATE4),7,2)||'일' AS DATE4
,TRIM(CHAR(FLOOR)) AS FLOOR
,CASE SPEC_GBN WHEN 'ES' THEN 'E/S' WHEN 'MW' THEN 'M/W' WHEN '' THEN '' WHEN 'BD' THEN '병원' WHEN 'BH' THEN '병원,장애' WHEN 'DW' THEN '덤웨이터' WHEN 'EB' THEN '비상,병원' WHEN 'EF' THEN '비상,화물' WHEN 'EH' THEN '비상,장애' WHEN 'EO' THEN '비상,전망' WHEN 'EP' THEN '비상' WHEN 'FT' THEN '화물' WHEN 'HC' THEN '장애' WHEN 'HF' THEN '인화' WHEN 'HY' THEN '유압' WHEN 'ND' THEN '누드' WHEN 'NH' THEN '누드,장애' WHEN 'OB' THEN '전망' WHEN 'OH' THEN '전망,장애' WHEN 'PF' THEN '인화' WHEN 'PS' THEN '인승' WHEN 'WL' THEN '휠체어' END AS SPEC_GBN
,CASE SPEC_GBN WHEN 'EH' THEN '로프식' WHEN 'HY' THEN '유압식' WHEN 'ES' THEN MAX(ESMW) WHEN 'MW' THEN MAX(ESMW) WHEN 'FT' THEN '로프식' ELSE '' END AS TYPE
,'현대E/L' AS COMP ,MAX(LIFNR) AS LIFNR ,MAX(PERNO) AS PERNO ,MAX(REQ_CELL) AS REQ_CELL ,MAX(J_1KFREPRE) AS J_1KFREPRE ,MAX(TELF1 ) AS TELF1 ,MAX(ZZACTSS ) AS ZZACTSS ,MAX(ADDR ) AS ADDR ,MAX(ZSITE_TEL ) AS ZSITE_TEL ,MAX(CHK_KIND ) AS CHK_KIND ,CAST(#NAMEC# AS VARCHAR(100)) ||' FAX:'||MAX(TELFX)||' ' AS NAMEC
--, '' AS NAMEC
,'' AS HOGIT ,'' AS TXT ,MAX(TXT03) AS TXT03 ,SUBSTR(MAX(DATE5),5,2)||'월'||SUBSTR(MAX(DATE5),7,2)||'일' AS DATE5 FROM ( SELECT P.MANDT ,P.PSPID ,P.POSID ,P.DATE4 ,M1.ZSITE_NM ,M2.ZSPEC2 ,P.LIFNR ,CASE WHEN M2.ZSPEC2 > '' AND (SUBSTR(M2.POSID_1,7,1) = 'S' OR SUBSTR(M2.POSID_1,7,1) = 'W') AND LOCATE('-',SUBSTR(M2.ZSPEC2, LOCATE( '-', M2.ZSPEC2 )+1)) > 0 THEN (SUBSTR(SUBSTR(M2.ZSPEC2, LOCATE( '-', M2.ZSPEC2 )+1),1,LOCATE('-',SUBSTR(M2.ZSPEC2, LOCATE( '-', M2.ZSPEC2 )+1))-1)) WHEN M2.ZSPEC2 > '' AND (SUBSTR(M2.POSID_1,7,1) = 'S' OR SUBSTR(M2.POSID_1,7,1) = 'W') AND LOCATE('-',SUBSTR(M2.ZSPEC2, LOCATE( '-', M2.ZSPEC2 )+1)) = 0 THEN (SUBSTR(SUBSTR(M2.ZSPEC2, LOCATE( '-', M2.ZSPEC2 )+1),1)) WHEN M2.ZSPEC2 > '' THEN CHAR(INT(VALUE(M2.ZSPEC11,'0'))) ELSE '0' END AS FLOOR
,CASE WHEN SUBSTR(P.POSID,7,1) = 'S' THEN 'ES' WHEN SUBSTR(P.POSID,7,1) = 'W' THEN 'MW' WHEN P.AUSE = '' AND SUBSTR(M2.ZSPEC2,1,2) = 'FT' AND M2.ZSPEC1 = 'HYD' THEN 'HY' WHEN P.AUSE = '' AND SUBSTR(M2.ZSPEC2,1,2) = 'FT' THEN 'FT' ELSE CASE WHEN P.AUSE <> '' THEN P.AUSE ELSE 'EH' END END AS SPEC_GBN
,(SELECT NAMET FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0002 WHERE MANDT = P.MANDT AND TEMNO = P2.PERNO) AS PERNO ,P2.REQ_CELL ,M.J_1KFREPRE ,M.TELF1 ,(SELECT CTEXT2 FROM SAPHEE.ZLCODE WHERE MANDT = P.MANDT AND CODE1 = 'PS003' AND LANG = #G_LANG# AND CODE2 = M1.ZZACTSS) AS ZZACTSS ,M1.ADDR1||' '||M1.ADDR2 AS ADDR ,M1.ZSITE_TEL ,P2.CHK_KIND ,CASE WHEN (SUBSTR(M2.POSID_1,7,1) = 'S' OR SUBSTR(M2.POSID_1,7,1) = 'W') AND M2.ZSPEC2 > '' THEN (SUBSTR(M2.ZSPEC2,1,LOCATE( '-', M2.ZSPEC2 )-1)) ELSE '0' END ESMW
,(SELECT TELFX FROM SAPHEE.ZMMT012 AS M WHERE M.MANDT = P.MANDT AND M.LIFNR = P.CODE2) AS TELFX ,P.TXT03 , ( SELECT X.DATE5 FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0042 AS X WHERE X.MANDT = P.MANDT AND X.PSPID = P.PSPID AND X.POSID = P.POSID ORDER BY CHASU FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY ) AS DATE5
FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0024 AS P LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMMT012 AS M ON P.MANDT = M.MANDT AND P.LIFNR = M.LIFNR AND M.KTOKK = '' ,SAPHEE.ZMASTER02 AS M2 ,SAPHEE.ZMASTER01 AS M1 ,SAPHEE.ZPST0036 AS P2 WHERE P.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND P.MANDT = M1.MANDT AND P.PSPID = M1.POSID AND P.MANDT = M2.MANDT AND P.PSPID = M2.POSID AND P.POSID = M2.POSID_1 AND P.MANDT = P2.MANDT AND P.PSPID = P2.PSPID AND P.POSID = P2.POSID AND P.DATE1 != '00000000' AND P2.CHK_KIND = 'A'
#GUBUN+#
) AS T GROUP BY FLOOR,SPEC_GBN
